title: RADS ERROR

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Please help me, I woke up this morning tryna play league but when I open it, it says "COULD NOT CONNECT TO THE HTTP SERVER". Can someone tell me how to fix this please? I restarted my computer 3 times already and I ran League of Legends in admin about 4 times already, nothing happens. Normal League of legends doesn't work but I can open PBE...

replies.body:
There may be network settings local to your PC that are preventing League from reaching the servers, as this is the most common cause for this error. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are good to go!

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
